track.name: Slow, Love, Slow
comments: Beautiful!
Was a four out of five song for me but then a heard the sax solo at the end. Holy shit!
This is amazing. Thoes who think Annete sucks should listen to this!
Mahtava biisi <3
This is Anette's song in my opinion. She really shines here. I cant imagine Tarja doing this one at all.
Mmmm Jazzwish noir. Cool.
I must admit that for me it is a little weak, but cool. Such a little blues. Anette perfect to be fit for the blues.
"Nightwish-Noir" OMFG. <3
This song was inspired by Twin Peaks soundtrack, jazz elements and atmosphere from 20's /30's, "Nightwish-Noir"
Nice try
A bold experiment - and the only song that really stood out on my first listen of "Imaginaerum". I instantly liked it! [2]

Hmmm, I can't make my mind up on this. Sometimes I think it's a beautiful masterpiece, sometimes it bores the crap out of me! It's one of those songs you have to be in the mood for I think. I always feel relieved when I Want My Tears Back bursts in and kicks the sh*t out of this! :-). I'm glad they experimented with this, but I can't help thinking it would have been better as a b- side or album closer personally...
Jazzwish [6] xD
Quite nice ;) soothing.
Awesome!
must admit, it took me a while to get in to it, but once I did... Amazing song. [3]  Hmm, yup.....Jazzwish [5].......this is the kind of stuff they would NEVER have been able to do with Tarja. [10]
This song is exactly for Anette [2]
addictive to the MAX! a real masterpiece!
